description:
This update enables Miiverse™ users to post screenshots to the related community.

- Disabling the Picture tool in order to post screenshots is now available. *Posting screenshots from all content made before installing this update will stay prohibited.

- Other small bugs and inaccurate terms have been fixed.

This is an update for the Painting Workshop application. This download does not contain the full version of the title. In order to use this update, you must have the full version of Painting Workshop. This update isn’t necessary if you are not using Miiverse™.
name: Painting Workshop
